resources.string: Welcome to the Fitts\' Tapping Task!

You will perform a series of trials where you will need to tap on a \"Start\" button to cause a target to appear on screen, then you will need to tap on the target to complete the trial.\n\n The targets will have varying sizes, and will be different distances away from the \"Start\" button you tap to begin a trial.

In this first set of trials, you will successfully tap on 90 targets while holding the device in your dominant hand, tapping all \"Start\" buttons and targets with your thumb. \n\n After you are holding the device as shown in the picture, tap \"Begin Trials\"

In this next set of trials, you will successfully tap on 90 targets while holding the device in your non-dominant hand, tapping all \"Start\" buttons and targets with your dominant hand\'s index finger. \n\n After you are holding the device as shown in the picture, tap \"Begin Trials\"
You\'re now halfway completed all of the trials. \n\n If you need, please take a break before continuing onto the last set. When you are ready, tap the \"Next Button\".
You\'ve finished all of the trials! \n\n Thank you for taking the time to complete this activity, you may now return the phone.
Experimenter, please choose the first tapping activity the participant will complete. \n\n After selection, hand the device to the participant for the test instructions.
